item.title: Enchanted Scepters
item.description: by Silicon Beach Software (1984) In this part-illustrated, part-text adventure, you are tasked with recovering four magical sceptres (earth, fire, wind and water, of course) to save your kingdom from invasion.

item.title: Iago
Phrase Craze
item.description: by Brad Pettit (1986) Borrowing heavily from the TV game show Wheel of Fortune, Phrase Craze offers up to four players the chance to relive the thrill of being on the set, complete with game board, wheel, and charming host. You could also modify the PhraseFile to create your own puzzles.
